questions.question: これは　わたし（＿）　かさです。

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「わたしのかさ」 means "my umbrella."

  • が - subject marker
  • に - target/direction marker
  • を - object marker
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer

The correct answer is の.

  • が - subject marker
  • に - target/direction marker
  • を - object marker

questions.question: にほんごの　授業（＿）　まいにち　あります。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～が あります - there is/are (non-living things like events, classes)

授業（じゅぎょう） - class

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「じゅぎょうがあります」 means "There is a class."

  • を - direct object marker (not for "あります")
  • に - location/time marker
  • で - action location marker
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer

The correct answer is が.

  • を - direct object marker (not for "あります")
  • に - location/time marker
  • で - action location marker

questions.question: スーパー（＿）　たまごを　かいました。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～で - indicates location of an action

かいました - bought

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「スーパーでたまごをかいました」 means "I bought eggs at the supermarket."

  • に - location of existence or destination
  • を - direct object marker
  • と - means "with"
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer

The correct answer is で.

  • に - location of existence or destination
  • を - direct object marker
  • と - means "with"
